relationships.description: Fred suggested a name for their group, which Hermione did not like.
Cho proposed an alternative name for their group, the D.A.
Ginny agreed with Hermione's suggestion to call their group Dumbledore's Army.
Harry is the leader of Dumbledore's Army and suggests practicing their skills.
